verses.verse: Now the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> gathered <S%H622>together<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H4264>armies<s%> to <S%H4421>battle,<s%> and were gathered <S%H622>together<s%> at <S%H7755>Shochoh,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> belongeth to <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H7755>Shochoh<s%> and <S%H5825>Azekah,<s%> in <S%H658>Ephes-dammim.<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were gathered <S%H622>together,<s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> by the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H425>Elah,<s%> and set the <S%H4421>battle<s%> in <S%H6186>array<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> a <S%H2022>mountain<s%> on the one <S%H4480>side,<s%> <S%H2088><s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> a <S%H2022>mountain<s%> on the other <S%H4480>side:<s%> <S%H2088><s%> and there was a <S%H1516>valley<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> them.

And there went <S%H3318>out<s%> a <S%H376>champion<s%> <S%H1143><s%> out of the <S%H4480>camp<s%> <S%H4264><s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H1555>Goliath,<s%> of <S%H4480>Gath,<s%> <S%H1661><s%> whose <S%H1363>height<s%> was <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> and a <S%H2239>span.<s%>

And he had a <S%H3553>helmet<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> was <S%H3847>armed<s%> with a <S%H8302>coat<s%> of <S%H7193>mail;<s%> and the <S%H4948>weight<s%> of the <S%H8302>coat<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H5178>brass.<s%>
And he had <S%H4697>greaves<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H7272>legs,<s%> and a <S%H3591>target<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> his <S%H3802>shoulders.<s%>

And the <S%H2671>staff<s%> of his <S%H2595>spear<s%> was like a <S%H707>weaver's<s%> <S%H4500>beam;<s%> and his <S%H2595>spear's<s%> <S%H3852>head<s%> weighed <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H1270>iron:<s%> and one <S%H5375>bearing<s%> a <S%H6793>shield<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him.

And he <S%H5975>stood<s%> and <S%H7121>cried<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4634>armies<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H4100>Why<s%> are ye come <S%H3318>out<s%> to set your <S%H4421>battle<s%> in <S%H6186>array?<s%> am <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> a <S%H6430>Philistine,<s%> and <S%H859>ye<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul?<s%> <S%H1262>choose<s%> you a <S%H376>man<s%> for you, and let him come <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> me.

If <S%H518><s%> he be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> me, and to <S%H5221>kill<s%> me, then will we <S%H1961>be<s%> your <S%H5650>servants:<s%> but <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H3201>prevail<s%> against him, and <S%H5221>kill<s%> him, then shall ye <S%H1961>be<s%> our <S%H5650>servants,<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> us.

And the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H2778>defy<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4634>armies<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> me a <S%H376>man,<s%> that we may <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>

When <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistine,<s%> they were <S%H2865>dismayed,<s%> and <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H3372>afraid.<s%>

Now <S%H1732>David<s%> was the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2088>that<s%> <S%H376>Ephrathite<s%> <S%H673><s%> of <S%H4480>Bethlehem-judah,<s%> <S%H1035><s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3448>Jesse;<s%> and he had <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H1121>sons:<s%> and the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> among <S%H376>men<s%> for an <S%H2204>old<s%> man in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul.<s%>

And the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1419>eldest<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H1980>followed<s%> <S%H310><s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to the <S%H4421>battle:<s%> and the <S%H8034>names<s%> of his <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to the <S%H4421>battle<s%> were <S%H446>Eliab<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> and <S%H4932>next<s%> unto him <S%H41>Abinadab,<s%> and the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H8048>Shammah.<s%>
And <S%H1732>David<s%> was the <S%H6996>youngest:<s%> and the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1419>eldest<s%> <S%H1980>followed<s%> <S%H310><s%> <S%H7586>Saul.<s%>

But <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> to <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> at <S%H1035>Bethlehem.<s%>
And the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> drew <S%H5066>near<s%> <S%H7925>morning<s%> and <S%H6150>evening,<s%> and presented <S%H3320>himself<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

And <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> for thy <S%H251>brethren<s%> an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H7039>parched<s%> corn, and <S%H2088>these<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3899>loaves,<s%> and <S%H7323>run<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp<s%> to thy <S%H251>brethren;<s%>

And <S%H935>carry<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H2757>cheeses<s%> <S%H2461><s%> unto the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of their <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and look <S%H6485>how<s%> thy <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H7965>fare,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> their <S%H6161>pledge.<s%>

Now <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and <S%H1992>they,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> were in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H425>Elah,<s%> <S%H3898>fighting<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H5203>left<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> a <S%H8104>keeper,<s%> and <S%H5375>took,<s%> and <S%H1980>went,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him; and he <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4570>trench,<s%> as the <S%H2428>host<s%> was going <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4634>fight,<s%> and <S%H7321>shouted<s%> for the <S%H4421>battle.<s%>
For <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> had put the battle in <S%H6186>array,<s%> <S%H4634>army<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H4634>army.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5203>left<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H3627>carriage<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H8104>keeper<s%> of the <S%H3627>carriage,<s%> and <S%H7323>ran<s%> into the <S%H4634>army,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H7592>saluted<s%> <S%H7965><s%> his <S%H251>brethren.<s%>

And as <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H1696>talked<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> them, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there came <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H376>champion,<s%> <S%H1143><s%> the <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> of <S%H4480>Gath,<s%> <S%H1661><s%> <S%H1555>Goliath<s%> by <S%H8034>name,<s%> out of the <S%H4480>armies<s%> <S%H4630><s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> according to the <S%H428>same<s%> <S%H1697>words:<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> them.

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> when they <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H6440><s%> him, and were <S%H3966>sore<s%> <S%H3372>afraid.<s%>

And the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Have ye <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> that is come <S%H5927>up?<s%> <S%H3588>surely<s%> to <S%H2778>defy<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is he come <S%H5927>up:<s%> and it shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> that the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5221>killeth<s%> him, the <S%H4428>king<s%> will <S%H6238>enrich<s%> him with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6239>riches,<s%> and will <S%H5414>give<s%> him his <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H2670>free<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> that <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5973>by<s%> him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> shall be <S%H6213>done<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H5221>killeth<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1975>this<s%> <S%H6430>Philistine,<s%> and taketh <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3478>Israel?<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H6430>Philistine,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> he should <S%H2778>defy<s%> the <S%H4634>armies<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H430>God?<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%> him after <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>manner,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>So<s%> shall it be <S%H6213>done<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H5221>killeth<s%> him.

And <S%H446>Eliab<s%> his <S%H1419>eldest<s%> <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> when he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H376>men;<s%> and <S%H446>Eliab's<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H1732>David,<s%> and he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> camest thou <S%H3381>down<s%> hither? and <S%H5921>with<s%> <S%H4310>whom<s%> hast thou <S%H5203>left<s%> <S%H2007>those<s%> <S%H4592>few<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness?<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H2087>pride,<s%> and the <S%H7455>naughtiness<s%> of thine <S%H3824>heart;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thou art come <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> thou mightest <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H4421>battle.<s%>
And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> have I <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H6213>done?<s%> Is there <S%H3808>not<s%> a <S%H1697>cause?<s%>

And he <S%H5437>turned<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H681><s%> him toward <S%H413>another,<s%> <S%H4136><s%> <S%H312><s%> and <S%H559>spoke<s%> after the <S%H2088>same<s%> <S%H1697>manner:<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1697>answered<s%> him <S%H7725>again<s%> after the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H1697>manner.<s%>

And when the <S%H1697>words<s%> were <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1696>spoke,<s%> they <S%H5046>rehearsed<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7586>Saul:<s%> and he <S%H3947>sent<s%> for him.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> Let <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H120>man's<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5307>fail<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of him; thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> will <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6430>Philistine.<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> Thou art <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him: <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art but a <S%H5288>youth,<s%> and <S%H1931>he<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> from his <S%H4480>youth.<s%> <S%H5271><s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1961>kept<s%> <S%H7462><s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and there <S%H935>came<s%> a <S%H738>lion,<s%> and a <S%H1677>bear,<s%> and <S%H5375>took<s%> a <S%H7716>lamb<s%> out of the <S%H4480>flock:<s%> <S%H5739><s%>

And I went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> him, and <S%H5337>delivered<s%> it out of his <S%H4480>mouth:<s%> <S%H6310><s%> and when he <S%H6965>arose<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, I <S%H2388>caught<s%> him by his <S%H2206>beard,<s%> and <S%H5221>smote<s%> him, and <S%H4191>slew<s%> him.

Thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H738>lion<s%> <S%H1571>and<s%> the <S%H1677>bear:<s%> and <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H6430>Philistine<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> as <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> them, <S%H3588>seeing<s%> he hath <S%H2778>defied<s%> the <S%H4634>armies<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>

David <S%H1732><s%> <S%H559>said<s%> moreover, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H5337>delivered<s%> me out of the <S%H4480>paw<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the <S%H738>lion,<s%> and out of the <S%H4480>paw<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the <S%H1677>bear,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me out of the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6430>Philistine.<s%> And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H1980>Go,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H3847>armed<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> with his <S%H4055>armor,<s%> and he <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H6959>helmet<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H7218>head;<s%> also he <S%H3847>armed<s%> him with a coat of <S%H8302>mail.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H2296>girded<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H4480>upon<s%> <S%H5921><s%> his <S%H4055>armor,<s%> and he <S%H2974>attempted<s%> to <S%H1980>go;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he had <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5254>proved<s%> it. And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> I <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> with <S%H428>these;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5254>proved<s%> them. And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5493>put<s%> them <S%H4480>off<s%> <S%H5921><s%> him.
